name: Serve the C.U.B.E
description:
A Halloween themed game made for the "Blocks of Jam" Jam.

This was uploaded directly at the last second, so please forgive my lateness.

This was made in Blender Game Engine (BGE) v2.79

WASD: Movement

Mouse: Look

LMB: Literally everything else. If you're confused about something, press LMB on it.

The main objective of this game is to collect the pumpkins around the map in a sequence of events and place them at an alter at the top of the stairs in front of the C.U.B.E in the centre of the map. Items you get from getting pumpkins are keys for certain people of things in the game to further your pumpkin collection, so look around and decide if the item you got previously could be used for whatever you find. If it is, you'll get an item and pumpkin, if not, try a different thing.

There is a .txt file in the folder titled: Order of Events.txt. This gives a subtle order of things you're meant to do since the game doesn't tell you yet.

EDIT: The game is currently unbeatable due to an unexpected bug, will be fixed soon
